author: Dimitris Karababas
description: From the Greek islands to the seaside city of Thessaloniki to historic Athens, Greece is a holiday paradise and I look forward to sipping this delicately honey balanced Tsipouro Sour on my next trip to Greece. In the meantime, perhaps make at home and dream of your next vacation.
name: Greek Vacation
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
